MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY13 postcode area of Whitchurch. We had no advance warning of this, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have located faulty electrical equipment and due to the repairs required, we now expect your supply to be restored by 1am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:16 AM on Monday, 02 November 2020.
